translations: （尤指某机构或个人所拥有的）车队，船队；舰队，海军；捕捞船队（fleet 的复数）
飞驰，掠过；转瞬即逝（fleet 的第三人称单数形式）

phrs.translation: 佛里特街（英国几家报馆办事处所在地）；伦敦报业；伦敦新闻界

sentences.sentence: Big, high-tech fleets ensure that everything in their path is pulled out of water.
sentences.translation: 大型高科技船队确保他们路途中所经过的一切都被从拉出水面。

sentences.sentence: "U.S. fleets are among the oldest in the world," said Richard Aboulafia, an aviation analyst.
sentences.translation: “美国的舰队是世界上最古老的飞机之一。”航空业分析师理查德·阿布拉菲亚表示。

sentences.sentence: This month, three U.S. bikeshare companies, Motivate. LimeBike and Spin, announced electric bicycles will be added to their fleets.
sentences.translation: 本月，三家美国共享单车公司 Motivate、LimeBike 和 Spin 宣布将把电动自行车纳入其业务范围。
